name: Cushin Pushin
description:
Push crates onto buttons to open doors. That's pretty much it.

However, crates will try to escape buttons, from the same direction they were pushed from.

Movement: Arrow keys

Replay Button: R

Game and level design, programming, environment art and sound effects by Salam Sibai.

Music: https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/pim-poy-pocket/

Instagram: @SSibai96
